description: Replacement of existing single glazed steel & UPVC windows to the rear/pebble dashed elevations with double glazed aluminium direct fix windows to match style and pattern of original glazing.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s): Style Design Sheet, Drawing No. THWC 2024 rev 0, Heritage Statement dated 27th August 2024, Site Location Plan, Design and Access Statement.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, in the interest of proper planning.

| The replacement window hereby approved shall be ultra slimline Benenden Conservation range with thermal break and double glazing directly fitted to the brickwork with aluminium frame and cills. Its glazing shall match the original windows with mainly plain glazing, however some would have dark pewter, antique finished leaded lights, with all original styles and designs replicated to match the inside, as specified on the supporting document Heritage Statement dated 27th August 2024.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
| The replacement of windows hereby approved shall match pattern and size of each existing window being replaced.

Reason: To ensure that the replacement windows are a good match for the existing, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B & 7C of the Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 & HC1 of the London Plan (2021 and the National PLanning Policy Framework (2023).
subdivision_of_building: This proposal is for the REAR windows into pebble dashed elevations only. There is already a granted planning application 181993FUL which covers the front and side elevations into Tudor boarding and white painted rendering.
